segments.text: Have you ever been shopping at Whole Foods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't . Is the food good there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They have the freshest foods there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to shop there , but I find the food at Whole Foods to be a lot better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They don't have a lot of organic foods there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there a big selection of organic foods at Whole Foods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They have lots of healthier food at Whole Foods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't been shopping there , but maybe I'll try it sometime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whole Foods is way better than Sons , trust me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take your word for it .
segments.speaker: S2
